div.class: et_pb_section et_pb_section_0 et_pb_with_background et_section_regular section_has_divider et_pb_bottom_divider

div.p: For the health and safety of our community, Independence Charter School will remain closed until further notice. Please continue to check our website for updates.
ICS administration will remain in close contact with families with further information as it develops.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_fullwidth_menu et_pb_fullwidth_menu_0 et_pb_bg_layout_dark et_pb_text_align_left et_dropdown_animation_fade et_pb_fullwidth_menu--without-logo et_pb_fullwidth_menu--style-left_aligned

li.class: et_pb_menu_page_id-3119 menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom current-menu-item current_page_item menu-item-home menu-item-3119

div.p: Independence Charter School (ICS) provides K-8 students throughout Philadelphia with a next-level, dual-language education experience. Combining exemplary instruction in STEAM academics, a dual-language instructional model and a comprehensive array of enrichment resources in the arts, business and civics, ICS prepares our students for success in the classroom, workplace, in the community and around the world.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_3 et_hover_enabled et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Creating successful, culturally aware global citizens.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_4 et_hover_enabled et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Dynamic, globally focused dual-language education model.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_5 et_hover_enabled et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Discover the benefits of a foundational education at ICS.

Parents and families of ICS students are deeply involved with every aspect of their education. Our faculty enjoys a close collaborative dynamic with parents and guardians to ensure their child has everything they need to thrive in and out of the classroom.

ICS maintains close, seamless and constant communication with our students’ families, and work them to ensure their future children have access to an education at our institution. Is your younger child ready to start their educational journey? Let’s get started.

p.span: The mission of the ICS Learning Support Program is to motivate and educate all students.

div.p: Get round-the-clock access to your child’s academic information, important school events and more through our intuitive Alma portal. Alma puts it all at your fingertips. Log in now.

div.h2: Independence Charter School Announces $9 Million Capital Expansion and Renovation

p.span: a Philadelphia K-8 public charter school offering bilingual education,

will be embarking on a $9 million, 25,000 square-foot facility expansion designed to enhance ICS’ ability to serving a diverse community of learners. With this renovation, ICS will have its first gym and auditorium, a larger, light-filled cafeteria, rooftop playground and ground-level play area, four additional classrooms, and additional office and meeting space. Construction will begin following the 2018-19 school year, and is slated for completion by August 2020.

div.p: Good Morning ICS Families, It’s been three weeks since ICS adjusted to help slow the spread of COVID-19. You’ve been inundated with information, emails, and news. We imagine that you're coping with many emotions, including anxiety, stress, and...
